## Conversion.GenericDefaultingConverter.withBrand() method

returns a converter which adds a brand to the type to prevent mismatched usage of simple types.

**Signature:**

```typescript
withBrand<B extends string>(brand: B): Converter<Brand<T | TD, B>, TC>;
```

</td><td>

The brand to be applied to the result value.


</td></tr>
